thread.title: Charlie Strong wears Golden Hat, Texas players throw coach in air after upset of Oklahoma
thread.title_full: Charlie Strong wears Golden Hat, Texas players throw coach in air after upset of Oklahoma | Dallas Morning News

author: SportsDayDFW.com
title: Charlie Strong wears Golden Hat, Texas players throw coach in air after upset of Oklahoma
text:
After weeks of turmoil and questions about Charlie Strong's job status, Texas wasted no team celebrating their upset of No. 10 Oklahoma on Saturday.
Strong didn't just take receive the Golden Hat, one of three trophies for the Red River Showdown, he wore it.
There's Charlie Strong's boss on the right, in case you're wondering about his job security. pic.twitter.com/egLaN8efDN
â€” Max Olson (@max_olson) October 10, 2015 Not long after that, the team lifted Strong up and helped him crowd surf.
It's already been quite a day for the Longhorns.
2015 AT&T Red River Showdown Texas 24, Oklahoma 17
